titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to Zachariah W. Owen
CWG13706

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; 1863 Office Expenses - Telegraph, Stationary - Transportation - Ordinance Stores; Bundle 3

body.p:
No 22
The State of Kentucky
To Zachariah W owen Dr

row.cell: For Transportation of thirty four recruits of Cap. J R. Jacobs company 14th Ky Cavalry from Red river Iron works Powell co Ky to Mt Stering, fourteen miles at 2 ct per mile
nine dollars and fifty two cents

p.note:
Approved
By order of the Governor
Jno. W Finnell
Adjt Genl Ky Vols

body.p: I certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated: and that they were a necessary for the public service
Jos. W. Stivers. Lt & recruiting officer
Received at Frankfort on, the 22 of Sept, 1863, of S. G. Suddarth Quartermaster ^Genl^ Kentucky volunteers the sum of nine Dollars and fifty two cents, in full of the above account.

No 22.
no 3 abstr U
Zachariah. W. owen

Dollars 9 -- 52/100
Paid Sept 22 63
AC
Transportation
J231
